phrase: 0  When I have detected a number of personnel requirements , I report the vacancy to the Personnel Department .
1  Then I wait to get the job description for review before it is advertized .
2  Under certain circumstances , I must ask for corrections again , otherwise I approve the job description .
3  Sometimes it also happens that the colleague from the HR department still has questions about the tasks and requirements before he can describe the job .
4  Then I am available for clarifications , of course .

act id: error codes: missing activity = m, wrong order = w, ambiguous = a, else leave empty
When I have detected a number of personnel requirements, I report the vacancy to the Personnel Department.
Then I wait to get the job description for review before it is advertized.
Under certain circumstances, I must ask for corrections again, otherwise I approve the job description.
Sometimes it also happens that the colleague from the HR department still has questions about the tasks and requirements before he can describe the job.
Then I am available for clarifications, of course.
